review: Great quality, fast streaming, hardly any buffering. I am running on 50 Megs speed internet. Love this, and would recommend any Fire TV products. Easy setup.
author: April  Bays

review: Can't get through the first five minutes of a movie, movie titles offered with "prime" are terrible, and it's too easy for a child to order extras while playing games or watching tv. We don't even turn it on anymore.
author: james d. hendrix

review: I like the Amazon TV I bought at the same time but for less than half the price, this is a steal for TVs that don't see the same kind of usage.
author: Ops Guy

review: Netflix and sling TV are barely usable. There are constant buffer underruns. Netflix runs fine on the chromecast.
author: J. Chang

review: Easy to install and use. You have to download each App tho that u want and make sure ur 1 click settings are set up on your Amazon account. My 8 yr old uses it.
author: Candace

review: I love my Fire TV stick. I have not watched anything other than my prime tv and movies since I got it.
author: gustafason

review: May allow you to view over 200,000 movies and tv episodes as it states on box,problem is you need to subscribe or rent to see probably 199,000 of them. Works great just not happy with the lack of fine print explaining the issues with it.
author: Bob Thomas
